title: SDoH-GPT: using large language models to extract social determinants of health
details: B Consoli, H Wang, X Wu, S Wang, X Zhao, Y Wang… - Journal of the American …, 2025
abstract: Objective Extracting social determinants of health (SDoHs) from medical notes depends heavily on labor-intensive annotations, which are typically task-specific, hampering reusability and limiting sharing. Here, we introduce SDoH-GPT, a novel …

abstract: Background Digital health behavior change interventions play an important role in helping cancer survivors improve their quality of life and reduce the risk of cancer recurrence. Clinician-patient communication is central to promoting the uptake of and …
